title: Migos
description: Migos - The best way to manage your Secret Santa
migosIsReadyToHelp: Migos is ready to help your group of friends to do your Secret Santa!
letUsWithTheBoringPart: Let us with the boring part, and make your xmas better
weWereCreatedToAddPracticalityToYourXmas: We were created to add practicality to your xmas with:
preRegisterCTA: I've heard that who is pre-registering will get a 30% discount on their first month and a lifetime 10% discount afterwards, is that true?
mobilePreRegisterCTA: I've heard that who is pre-registering will get a 30% discount on their first month and a lifetime 10% discount afterwards, and also has a lot more benefits for the early adopters, is that true?
weAreExcitedToHaveYouJoinUs: We're excited to have you join us at
weveReceivedYourPreRegistrationRequest: We've received your pre-registration request. We'll notify you as soon as we're ready to welcome you aboard!
inTheMeantimeKeepAnEyeOnYourInboxAt: In the meantime, keep an eye on your inbox at
weWillBeSendingYouImportantUpdatesAboutY: We'll be sending you important updates about your account status
thisIsAnAutomatedEmailPleaseDoNotReply: This is an automated email. Please do not reply.
preRegisterError: An error occurred while pre-registering. Please try again.
earlyAccessToNewFeatures: Get early access to new features before anyone else and stay updated on development progress through our exclusive beta program.
shapeTheFutureOfMigos: Shape the future of Migos by having your feature requests prioritized. Your feedback will directly influence our development roadmap.
receivePioneerBenefits: Receive a unique Pioneer Badge, exclusive Discord role, and easy access to our team.
